headline: Lam Research Links CEA Leti Partnership And New Leaders To AI Demand
summary: Lam Research (NasdaqGS:LRCX) has entered a multi year collaboration with CEA Leti focused on next generation specialty technology devices and advanced fabrication processes. The partnership targets new materials and process flows for applications in AI, high performance computing and other specialty semiconductor uses. The company has made executive changes, including appointing Dr. Anirudh Devgan, president and CEO of Cadence Design Systems, to its board of directors. Lam Research has also...

headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From Lam Research’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: Lam Research’s fourth quarter was defined by robust revenue growth and strong operational execution, with management crediting the company’s advanced etch and deposition technologies as primary contributors. CEO Tim Archer emphasized that rapid adoption of AI workloads drove customer investment in leading-edge foundry and memory capacity, while recent product launches like the Aqara etch system and major service upgrades expanded Lam’s footprint across DRAM, NAND, and logic segments. Archer note
